transmissions
Class Protocol

java.lang.Object
  transmissions.Protocol
All Implemented Interfaces:
DataConstants, Transmitter, EndSteppable, Prepareable, Steppable, Saveable
public class Protocol
extends java.lang.Object
implements Transmitter, DataConstants, Prepareable, EndSteppable, Saveable

The protocol class handles transmitting and receiving transmissions.

Author:
Niels Thykier

getIncomming

public Transmission getIncomming()
The transmission gotten this step. (May be null, if none was received). This transmission may be corrupted before round end.

Returns:
The incomming transmission.

getReceived

public Transmission getReceived()
The incomming transmission becomes the received transmission in the end step if it was not corrupted. (May be null, if none was received).

Returns:
The received transmission
